com.interpss.dstab.datatype

Class LimitExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.interpss.numeric.datatype.LimitType
      • com.interpss.dstab.datatype.LimitExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LimitExpression
extends LimitType
    A data structure to represent a limit with upper and lower limits expressed as expresion functions or mix of double and function
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
